check for Error or Verify Message Type

step.name: Concat Date-Time and Random Value for New Message ID
Don't Generate another Error on an Error or Verify
Inject Values into NCPDP Error Message Template

field.replace_by_string: Processing Hub was unable to send outbound message.

step.name: Insert to INBOUND_NCPDP_MSG
Set message_status Failed 2 2
Set message_status Success 2 2
Table input
step.sql: select (select value from app_configuration where key = 'ERX_URL')|| (select value from app_configuration where key = 'OB_RS_URI')as url, '{"outboundNcpdpMsgId":"'||t.outbound_ncpdp_msg_id||'"}' as body, (nvl(extractvalue(xmltype(nvl(message_status_details,'<outboundSendRetry></outboundSendRetry>')),'//outboundSendRetry'), 0)) + 1 as runCount, nvl((select value from app_configuration where key = 'OB_RETRY'),0) as retry, t.pharmacy_id pharmacy_id, (select ncpdp_id from pharmacy where pharmacy_id = t.pharmacy_id) pharmacy_ncpdpid, t.outbound_ncpdp_msg_id outbound_ncpdp_msg_id, t.message_id message_id, t.message_type message_type, t.message_status message_status, '' as message, '' as error_code, '' as error_desc from erx.outbound_ncpdp_msg t where t.outbound_ncpdp_msg_id = ${OUTBOUND_NCPDP_MSG_ID} and t.message_status in ('4009','4004') -- and t.message_status in ('4009','4004','3006') --${OUTBOUND_NCPDP_MSG_ID}

step.name: To OB Check Failure Allow Retry
check for Error or Verify Message Type
step.send_true_to: Don't Generate another Error on an Error or Verify

step.name: check for retry
step.send_false_to: To OB Check Failure Allow Retry

hop.to: TODO: return ERROR with XSD violation back to VistA

step.name: Filter rows
step.send_false_to: TODO: return ERROR with XSD violation back to VistA

step.name: Outbound eRx Messages to Process
step.sql: select t.outbound_ncpdp_msg_id outbound_ncpdp_msg_id, x.message_id, x.rel_to_message_id, x.message_type, xmlroot (t.message,version '1.0', standalone NO).getClobVal() message, nvl((select pharmacy_id from pharmacy where to_char(ncpdp_id) = nvl(x.pharmacy_ncpdpid1,x.pharmacy_ncpdpid2)),0) pharmacy_id, '4009' message_status_new, '3006' message_status_xml_invalid, '4001' message_status_sent, '${NCPDP_XSD}' ncpdp_xsd_path, (nvl(extractvalue(xmltype(nvl(t.message_status_details,'<outboundSendRetry></outboundSendRetry>')),'//outboundSendRetry'), 0)) + 1 as runCount, nvl((select value from app_configuration where key = 'OB_RETRY'),0) as retry from outbound_ncpdp_msg t, xmltable(xmlnamespaces('http://www.ncpdp.org/schema/SCRIPT' as "ns"), '/ns:Message' passing t.message columns message_id varchar2(35) path '//ns:Header/ns:MessageID', rel_to_message_id varchar2(35) path '//ns:Header/ns:RelatesToMessageID', message_type varchar2(35) path 'name(/ns:Body/*[1])', pharmacy_ncpdpid1 varchar2(30) path '//ns:Pharmacy/ns:Identification/ns:NCPDPID', pharmacy_ncpdpid2 varchar2(30) path '//ns:Header/ns:From') x where t.message_status in ('0000','4004') and x.message_type is not null

step.name: TODO: return ERROR with XSD violation back to VistA

entry.name: Check for Messages to Process
entry.custom_sql: select outbound_ncpdp_msg_id , '4009' as outbound_delivery_in_process, (nvl(extractvalue(xmltype(nvl(message_status_details,'<outboundSendRetry></outboundSendRetry>')),'//outboundSendRetry'), 0)) + 1 as runCount, nvl((select value from app_configuration where key = 'OB_RETRY'),0) as retry from outbound_ncpdp_msg where --message_type in ('RefillRequest','CancelResponse','Error','RxChangeRequest', 'Verify') --and message_status in ('0000','4004') and rownum < ${OB_DLVRY_JOB_BATCH_SIZE}
